snippet.title: Ziggurat 2 - Steam Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Ziggurat is back, and now it's even better!

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1159560

Use powerful weapons and spells to break through hordes of enemies and explore laberynthine dungeons in this hectic roguelite FPS, while you improve your skills and discover new equipment.

Join the Discord server: https://discord.gg/vq2pb9U
